dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Bill Gates at the top with 200 billion dollars—I mean, is anyone even surprised anymore?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bill Gates at the top with two hundred billion dollars-I mean, is anyone even surprised anymore?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But wait, uh, did you see how many Samsung-related names are on that list? Lee Kun-hee, Jay Y. Lee… it's like a family reunion up in there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But wait, uh, did you see how many Samsung-related names are on that list? Lee Kun-hee, Jay Y. Lee... it's like a family reunion up in there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics #4 Jay Y. Lee $6.7 B 52 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and all these Korean billionaires, like Kim Jung-ju from Nexon with 9.6 billion? I had no idea online games were that lucrative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and all these Korean billionaires, like Kim Jung-ju from Nexon with nine point six billion? I had no idea online games were that lucrative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #3 Kim Jung-ju $9.6 B 52 online games, Nexon

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! And then there's Elon Musk at number two with SpaceX and Tesla—classic, but still mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! And then there's Elon Musk at number two with SpaceX and Tesla-classic, but still mind-blowing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Jeff Bezos hanging in there with Amazon at 120 billion. It's like the usual suspects, but then sprinkled with so many new names from tech and gaming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Jeff Bezos hanging in there with Amazon at one hundred twenty billion. It's like the usual suspects, but then sprinkled with so many new names from tech and gaming.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Photo by Victor Burdin Gyeongbokgung Palace Complex in Seoul The List.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and a lot of them are in their 30s too—like Kwon Hyuk-bin from Smilegate Holdings, only 30 years old with 4 billion? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and a lot of them are in their 30s too-like Kwon Hyuk-bin from Smilegate Holdings, only thirty years old with four billion? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #6 Kwon Hyuk-bin $4 B 46 online games, Smilegate Holdings

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what we're doing with our lives, honestly. Even Warren Buffet, though—94 years old and still on the list!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what we're doing with our lives, honestly. Even Warren Buffet, thoughminus ninety four years old and still on the list!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Photo by Victor Burdin Gyeongbokgung Palace Complex in Seoul The List.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True dedication. But you know what stood out to me? How many are from online services and gaming—Kakao, Nexon, NCSoft… it's a whole industry dominating wealth now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True dedication. But you know what stood out to me? How many are from online services and gaming-Kakao, Nexon, NCSoft... it's a whole industry dominating wealth now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #5 Kim Beom-su $5.2 B 54 online services, Kakao #10 Kim Taek-jin $2.5 B 53 online games, NCSOFT

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And then there's cosmetics, like Suh Kyung-bae from Amorepacific—3 billion just from makeup and skincare? Genius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And then there's cosmetics, like Suh Kyung-bae from Amorepacificminus three billion just from makeup and skincare? Genius.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Meanwhile, I'm over here trying to pick a moisturizer without breaking the bank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Meanwhile, I'm over here trying to pick a moisturizer without breaking the bank.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hah, same. But hey, at least we can live vicariously through this list. Coupang's Bom Kim cracking the list with a cool billion? Online retail is no joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hah, same. But hey, at least we can live vicariously through this list. Coupang's Bom Kim cracking the list with a cool billion? Online retail is no joke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #31 Bom Kim $1 B 41 online retailing, Coupang

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For real. And all these heirs too—like the Hyundai and LG families. It's dynasty central.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For real. And all these heirs too-like the Hyundai and L G families. It's dynasty central.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #8 Mong-Koo Chung $3.2 B 82 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor #13 Koo Kwang-mo $1.8 B 42 LG

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about legacy versus self-made, you know? But either way, the numbers are just staggering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about legacy versus self-made, you know? But either way, the numbers are just staggering.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Anyway, next time I play an online game, I'm gonna wonder if I'm funding someone's next billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Anyway, next time I play an online game, I'm gonna wonder if I'm funding someone's next billion.

artist_script:
HostA: Bill Gates at the top with 200 billion dollars—I mean, is anyone even surprised anymore?
HostB: Right? But wait, uh, did you see how many Samsung-related names are on that list? Lee Kun-hee, Jay Y. Lee… it’s like a family reunion up in there.
HostA: Yeah, and all these Korean billionaires, like Kim Jung-ju from Nexon with 9.6 billion? I had no idea online games were that lucrative.
HostB: Seriously! And then there’s Elon Musk at number two with SpaceX and Tesla—classic, but still mind-blowing.
HostA: And Jeff Bezos hanging in there with Amazon at 120 billion. It’s like the usual suspects, but then sprinkled with so many new names from tech and gaming.
HostB: Yeah, and a lot of them are in their 30s too—like Kwon Hyuk-bin from Smilegate Holdings, only 30 years old with 4 billion? That’s wild.
HostA: Makes you wonder what we’re doing with our lives, honestly. Even Warren Buffet, though—94 years old and still on the list!
HostB: True dedication. But you know what stood out to me? How many are from online services and gaming—Kakao, Nexon, NCSoft… it’s a whole industry dominating wealth now.
HostA: Absolutely. And then there’s cosmetics, like Suh Kyung-bae from Amorepacific—3 billion just from makeup and skincare? Genius.
HostB: Right? Meanwhile, I’m over here trying to pick a moisturizer without breaking the bank.
HostA: Hah, same. But hey, at least we can live vicariously through this list. Coupang’s Bom Kim cracking the list with a cool billion? Online retail is no joke.
HostB: For real. And all these heirs too—like the Hyundai and LG families. It’s dynasty central.
HostA: Makes you think about legacy versus self-made, you know? But either way, the numbers are just staggering.
HostB: Totally. Anyway, next time I play an online game, I’m gonna wonder if I’m funding someone’s next billion.
